prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon that resembles a spider with vibrant red and yellow accents.
Imagine a dark forest creature with a sleek, insectoid appearance and menacing features.
Design a Pokemon that combines arachnid traits with a striking color scheme of red and blue.
Show me a unique bug/poison-type Pokemon that can camouflage in its environment.
Generate a Pokemon that has a body structure similar to a spider but with a colorful twist.
Give me an image of a Pokemon that is both creepy and colorful, perfect for a spooky forest setting.
Make a Pokemon that features sharp, metallic legs and a bright red body, ideal for a villainous role.
